sourcesContent:
export const Blogs = [
    {
        id:1,
        name:"Learn Solidity – A Handbook for Smart Contract Development",
        tags:["Solidity","Blockchain","free Code Camp"],
        date:"14 Dec, 2022",
        imgSrc:"https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/content/images/size/w1000/2022/12/pexels-pixabay-417173--2-.jpg",
        link:"https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/learn-solidity-handbook/"
    },
    {
        id:2,
        name:"A Gentle Introduction to Blockchain Oracles & Chainlink",
        tags:["Oracles","Chainlink","Blockchain"],
        date:"6 Sep, 2022",
        imgSrc:"https://miro.medium.com/max/720/1*hnM5qQlS6Va1bBZpuCfHAA.webp",
        link:"https://coinsbench.com/100daysofweb3-week-1-blockchain-oracles-chainlink-49d75d2bbedc"
    },
    {
        id:3,
        name:"13 Projects You Can Do to Become a Web3 and Blockchain Master - Beginner to Expert",
        tags:["Blockchain","Web3"],
        date:"23 Jun, 2022",
        imgSrc:"https://blog.suhailkakar.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.hashnode.com%2Fres%2Fhashnode%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1655974264630%2F9UZNpvvfM.png%3Fw%3D1600%26h%3D840%26fit%3Dcrop%26crop%3Dentropy%26auto%3Dcompress%2Cformat%26format%3Dwebp&w=1920&q=75",
        link:"https://blog.suhailkakar.com/13-projects-you-can-do-to-become-a-web3-and-blockchain-master-beginner-to-expert"
    },
    {
        id:4,
        name:"How I became a BlockChain Developer in 2022 for free:",
        tags:["Web3","Solidity","Hardhat"],
        date:"20 Aug, 2022",
        imgSrc:"https://miro.medium.com/max/720/1*j-cLMLNKww7HND1GlhrWzA.webp",
        link:"https://coinsbench.com/how-i-became-a-blockchain-developer-in-2022-for-free-fca9c0fff4dd"
    },
    {
        id:5,
        name:"What is Danksharding? EIP-4844 and Danksharding Explained",
        tags:["EIP-4844","Proto-Danksharding","Danksharding"],
        date:"22 Dec, 2022",
        imgSrc:"https://moralis.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/what-is-danksharding-eip-4844-and-danksharding-explained-1-1024x576.jpg",
        link:"https://moralis.io/what-is-danksharding-eip-4844-and-danksharding-explained/"
    },
    {
        id:6,
        name:"The Best Ethereum API in 2023 – Ultimate Guide",
        tags:["Ethereum API","EVM API"],
        date:"12 Dec, 2022",
        imgSrc:"https://moralis.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/The-Best-Ethereum-API-in-2023-1024x576.jpg",
        link:"https://moralis.io/the-best-ethereum-api-in-2023-ultimate-guide/"

    },
   
    {
        id:7,
        name:"How Developers Can Add Blockchain-Based Data Storage Into Web3 Projects",
        tags:[" Blockchain-Based Data Storage"," Blockchain-Based Cloud Storage System","Blockchain-Based File Storage"],
        date:"29 dec, 2021",
        imgSrc:"https://res.cloudinary.com/practicaldev/image/fetch/s--ZY1EK-Eo--/c_imagga_scale,f_auto,fl_progressive,h_420,q_auto,w_1000/https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/bcz1u90oq3prr5fga3fs.png",
        link:"https://dev.to/codebucks/what-is-redux-simply-explained-2ch7"
    },
    {
